pages.title: Probe Rockets
pages.text: Probe rockets are your first step into space exploration. These unmanned vessels collect samples and data from space, returning with valuable resources.$(br2)While limited in capability, they are essential for gathering the initial resources needed for more advanced spacecraft.

pages.title: Using Probe Rockets
pages.text: 1. Craft a $(thing)Launch Rail$() and place it$(br)2. Right-click the Launch Rail with a Probe Rocket$(br)3. Right-click the Launch Rail again to launch$(br)4. Wait 60 seconds for the probe to return$(br)5. Collect your rewards$(br2)$(warning)Ensure there is clear space above the launch rail!

pages.title: Troubleshooting
pages.text: If you get a "No rocket in launch rail" message:$(br)1. Make sure you're using a $(thing)Launch Rail$(), not a Landing Pad$(br)2. Try placing the rocket again$(br)3. Ensure the rocket is positioned correctly$(br)4. Check that there are no blocks obstructing placement$(br)5. Verify you're using a Probe Rocket, not another type
